array.string: Double-tap on a track segment to select it and everything connected to it.
When multiple track segments are selected, use press-and-hold to add to or subtract from the selection.
Double-tap with two fingers on segments to toggle switches.
The switch button in the track selection popup menu can toggle switches. Also, a long-press on the button will remove the switch completely.
The rotate gesture can be used to rotate selected track segments.
Double-tap the delete button to delete track.
The last few track deletions (of more than one segment) can be restored from the main toolbar.
Tap the four-arrows button (in the top toolbar) to find and follow the train.
Drag anywhere to stop following the train.
The four-arrows button may be also be long-pressed to reset the world zoom.
